main.title: the facility
main.body: as your shovel touches the ground, a trapdoor emerges out of the ground, breaking the surrounding shoreline.
main.visitedBody: a trapdoor sits open, showing a staircase leading into a concrete stronghold.

the-staricase.title: the staircase
the-staricase.body: as the door opens, a staircase descending into darkness is revealed. long lost vegetation and fungus coats on the walls, resembling the world from before.
the-staricase.visitedBody: the staircase descends into the darkness deep below. long lost vegetation and fungus coats on the walls, resembling the world from before.

the-door.title: the door
the-door.body: after many flights of stairs, you finally reach the bottom, a green button along the wall being the only light.

the-room.title: the room
the-room.body: as the button is pressed, a door slides open on the far wall, revealing a small room containing a single item.
the-room.visitedBody: as the button is pressed, a door slides open on the far wall, revealing a small room.
